## Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
```


## Reading in Data
```{r}
wordle_data <- read_xlsx("~/Summer-Internship--24/Wordle Game - Survey (Responses) _Redacted.xlsx")
```


## Making New Data Frame
```{r}
wordle_results <- wordle_data %>%
  rename(Results = "Paste game results here") %>%
  select(Results)
```
